DOC.brief_summary: This study aim monitor incidence rate duration hospitalisation rotavirus gastroenteritis ( RV GE ) cause GE , compare bronchiolitis 1998 2009 , child < 5 year age introduction Rotarix 2006 year , inside outside rotavirus season Australia . It aim compare two dose regimen Rotarix three dose regimen RotaTeq 2007 2009 .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Rotavirus Vaccination Hospitalisations Rotavirus Gastroenteritis Children Aged < 5 Years Australia
